articles.title: Up Next COVID outbreak forces AFL to delay fixture release - AFL
articles.description: The League will wait until at least next week to release the details of the next fixture block
articles.content:
THE NEXT fixture block has been delayed until next week as the AFL gives itself more time to assess Brisbane's COVID-19 situation.
